cab.content: I desire to refer to the organisation known as the Supply and Transport Organisation upon which past Governments have relied in times of industrial crisis for the maintenance of supplies essential to the life of the civil community.The general lines of the organisation in its present form are set out in the annexed report (C.P.314(25)),Assuming that the Cabinet deoire that the organisation should continue in being I suggest that they should record a conclusion to that effect and should authorize the setting up of the Cabinet Committee and the appointment by the Prime Minister of a Chief Civil Commissioner and other Civil Commissioners as may be found desirable (see last paragraph of annexed Report).SECRET.CABINET.CP. 496(24)SUPPLY AND TRANSPORT ORGANISATION.Note by the Home Secretary.W.J.H.HOME OFFICE, 19.11.24.
